<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="KPI Details">807682d447dc8e90118c2d8fe16d436f</macroponent><name>container_31/isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    console.log(api.state.selectedAgents);

    // show component if the value contains value --> false

    if (api.state.selectedAgents === null ||
        api.state.selectedAgents.trim() === "" ||
        api.state.selectedAgents.trim() === undefined) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }

    // return agentsToDisplay !== null || agentsToDisplay.trim() !== "";
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.montanez</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-12 18:03:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>3a11b6b547508ad0118c2d8fe16d439b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>container_31/isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Optimiz AIOps Insights" source="x_opti8_optimiz_ai">d4d83ad9878802d0e7ae55b83cbb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Optimiz AIOps Insights">d4d83ad9878802d0e7ae55b83cbb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_3a11b6b547508ad0118c2d8fe16d439b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.montanez</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-12 18:09:56</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
